name: assetwatcher
description: Smarter file change watcher supporting executing commands for files individually and ignoration of imported files.
author: danielkalen

scripts.compile: coffee -o ./ -c src/assetwatcher.coffee && npm run prependbin && npm run makeexec
scripts.prependbin: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - assetwatcher.js > tmp.js && mv tmp.js assetwatcher.js
